segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Robert, thanks for making time. I know you mentioned your team had some questions after the technical review.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Yes, the technical team was impressed overall. Their main question is around data security and compliance. We're in financial services so SOC 2 and GDPR are non-negotiable.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Completely understand. We're SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant. I can send over our security documentation and compliance certificates.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: That would be perfect. Also, we need data residency in the EU. Is that possible?

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Yes, we have EU data centers in Frankfurt and Amsterdam. You can choose your data residency region.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Great. That checks a major box for us. Our compliance officer will be relieved.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Now, about pricing. Your proposal came in higher than we expected. We're comparing against two other vendors and they're about 30% cheaper.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: I appreciate you being direct. Let me ask - are those vendors offering the same level of AI capabilities and integrations?

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Honestly, no. Yours is more sophisticated. But budget is budget, and I need to justify the premium to our CFO.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: What would really help is if you had an ROI calculator or some kind of business case template. Something I could fill in with our numbers and present to leadership.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: We actually do have an ROI calculator. I should have mentioned it earlier - let me send that over right after this call.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Perfect. You know what else would be valuable? If you could add a TCO comparison tool that factors in implementation costs and time savings. That's what CFOs really want to see.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: By the way, I've been using your trial for two weeks now and I have to say - the call summary feature is phenomenal. It's saved me probably 5 hours this week alone.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: That's great to hear! The call summaries are one of our most loved features.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Seriously, it's like having a personal assistant on every call. My team is already asking when we can roll this out company-wide.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: One thing that would make it even better - can you add multi-language support? We have teams in Japan and Germany who conduct calls in local languages.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: Currently we support English, Spanish, French, and German. Japanese is in beta - I can get you early access if you'd like.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Yes please! That would be amazing. Our Japan team would love to test it.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: I also noticed your emails have been getting caught in our spam filter. Not sure if others have reported that, but your nurture sequences never make it to my inbox.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: That's really helpful feedback, I'll pass that to our marketing team. We definitely want to fix that.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Speaking of marketing - I read your recent blog post on 'The Future of Sales Intelligence'. Really well written. You should do more content like that.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Actually, you should write something about how companies can calculate the true cost of bad forecasting. That's a topic I'd share with my whole network.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Alright, let's talk timeline. If we can agree on terms by end of week, I can get the PO through before the holiday freeze.

segments.speaker: rep
segments.text: That works for us. I'll have a revised proposal with the volume discount we discussed sent over by tomorrow.

segments.speaker: prospect
segments.text: Sounds good. I'm excited to get this done. Your product is genuinely impressive and my team is already bought in.
